effects: Restore 1000 (+3.4x, Heal) HP to all allies
Cure all status effects for all allies
name: Prime Heal

desc_short.0: Restore HP and cure poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone for all allies
desc_short.5: Recupera VIT y cura ven, ceg, sue, sil, par, con, enf y pie de todos los aliados
